newsitem.title: UK: Enterprise Oil rebounds from recent drop.
newsitem.headline: Enterprise Oil rebounds from recent drop.

text.p: Shares in Enterprise Oil rebounded on Friday, gaining 11-1/2p to 543-1/2p by 1313 GMT, amid perceptions the recent decline was overdone, dealers said.
"It has been a bad market for a while and shares got pushed down too far," said one dealer. "I think this is closer to the level where they ought to be."
Shares across the oil sector were firm.
Shell Transport shares climbed 9p to 967-1/2p, recovering some of the ground lost during the last couple of weeks.
Shares in British Petroleum added 4p to 638p as Salomon Brothers set a price target 720p for the shares on expectations for a strong fourth quarter.
